com.codenvy.example.swing

Class TrackerProtocol

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codenvy.example.swing.TrackerProtocol

  • public class TrackerProtocol
extends java.lang.Object
    TrackerProtocol sends the initial request to the tracker to get the list of peers for this torrent and parses the response. Builds the files once they have been fully downloaded

      • buildFiles

        public void buildFiles(java.io.File tmpFile,
                       java.util.ArrayList<java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>> files,
                       java.lang.String downloadPath)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Builds the file system and constructs each file based on byte offsets in the temp file
        Parameters:
        tmpFile - the temp file holding the byte array of each file in sequence
        files - the arraylist of files and file systems
        downloadPath - the file path to build the downloaded filesystem in
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
